overview: When Jim loses his job at the bar he has no choice but to move back to his hometown. Upon his return he learns the father of a childhood friend has gone missing. With nothing but free time, a fascination with conspiracies, and his own spiraling mental state, Jim enlists the help of his 16 year old cousin, Colly, to solve the mystery.  Strarring  Jim Murtagh,  Colin Van Hoek,  Christine Turturro,  Andrew Van Hoek,  Ian Van Hoek,  Aidan Van Hoek  written & directed by Jim Murtagh, cinematography by Colin Van Hoek, produced by Jim Murtagh & Colin Van Hoek
tagline: Stuff like this happens all the time
title: And the Boys Struck Gold
